item.title: Remap Keys in Ubuntu [20.04]
item.description: Open Terminal using Ctrl + Alt + T or from the app launcher Navigate to the directory /usr/share/X11/xkb/symbols cd /usr/share/X11/xkb/symbols Edit the file pc as administrator/root user

item.title: My First Interview
item.description: In this post, I’ll share the experience on my first interview with Cisco.
